bit-field.name: RSTDISBL
bit-field.description: Reset Disabled (Enable PC2 as i/o pin)

bit-field.name: EESAVE
bit-field.description: Preserve EEPROM through the Chip Erase cycle

bit-field.name: ULPOSCSEL
bit-field.description: Frequency selection for internal ULP oscillator. The selection only affects system clock, watchdog and reset timeout always use 32 kHz clock.

bit-field.name: BODPD
bit-field.description: BOD mode of operation when the device is in sleep mode

bit-field.name: BODACT
bit-field.description: BOD mode of operation when the device is active or idle
